title: GitHub Student Developer Pack
description: Access to GitHub Pro, GitHub Copilot, and over 100 premium developer tools, including cloud credits, free domains, and professional software.

title: Notion Education Plus
description:
Free Notion Plus Plan for students. Unlimited file uploads, integrations, longer page history and much more; works for any .edu email.

You can also (later on) sign up via GH SDP to get unlimited guests here, or sign up as a student organitzation or club here.

title: JetBrains Student License
description: Free access to all JetBrains IDEs like IntelliJ IDEA, PyCharm, WebStorm, and GoLand. Professional tools for programmers.

title: Appwrite Cloud
description: 150GB of free storage, global CDN, and developer services: databases, APIs, and serverless functions.

title: Deepnote
description: Online notebooks to work with Python and share easily without local installations.

title: Camber
description: Advanced scientific simulations with AI. Solve differential equations and generate matplotlib graphs automatically.

title: Namecheap Domains
description: One year of free .me domain for students. Ideal for portfolios and personal projects with GitHub Pages or Vercel.

title: Educative Courses
description: 6 months of free access to professional courses in programming, systems, and web development.

title: Frontend Masters
description: 6 months free access to exclusive web development courses: React, Vue, Node.js, advanced CSS, and more.

title: AlgoExpert
description: Access to 20 technical interview questions on algorithms and data structures. Includes explanations and detailed videos.

title: Microsoft Azure
description: Free credits and up to 2 years of access to virtual machines and cloud services with the GitHub Student Pack.

title: DigitalOcean
description: €200 in free credits to spend in 1 year. Perfect for deploying VPS, web apps, and databases.

title: Autodesk Education
description: Free access to the entire Autodesk suite for 3 years: AutoCAD, Maya, Fusion 360, Revit, and more.

title: Microsoft Office 365
description: Free Microsoft Office 365 A1 for schools (only web apps), and Microsoft Office 365 A3 at 2.75€/user.

title: Figma Education Plan
description: Free access to Figma Professional plan while you are a student. Ideal for UI/UX and collaborative design.

title: Unity Student Plan
description: Unity Pro free for students. Develop professional games and simulations at no cost.

title: MATLAB & Simulink
description:
Elegibility to buy the Matlab Student Suite for one-time payment of 69€ (for comparison coommercial license is 938€/year).

Note: You may already have free access to the MATLAB and Simulink suite if your university has a campus license.

title: Lucidchart
description: Free premium version of Lucidchart for students. Ideal for creating diagrams, flows, and concept maps.

title: Spotify Premium
description: Spotify Premium at 50% discount: ad-free music, offline downloads, and unlimited skips.

title: Amazon Prime
description: Discounted Prime subscription: free shipping, Prime Video, and more. Only €24.95/year.

title: Strava
description: 30 days free, then 50% discount for the Strava Premium Plan (24,99€/yeer).

title: Google Gemini
description: 1 month free trial of Gemini Pro with 2TB storage and NotebookLM.

title: Codédex
description: Learn-to-code platform for Gen-Z with practical courses (Python, HTML, CSS, JS, React, Git). Verified students usually get 6 months of Codédex Club free via GitHub Student Pack.

title: Scrimba
description: Interactive learning platform (specialized in frontend). With the GitHub Student Pack, you usually get 1 month of free Pro access to explore courses and projects.

title: InterviewCake
description: Resources and practice for technical interviews (algorithms, data structures). The student offer gives full access for 1 week via GitHub Student Pack.

title: Visme
description: All-in-one tool to create presentations, infographics, and visual content. Students get 3 months free access to Visme's Starter plan.

title: Tower
description: Powerful desktop Git client for macOS and Windows. Free license for Tower Pro while you are a student.

title: Termius
description: SSH client that works on desktop and mobile with cross-platform sync. Free access to all Termius Pro and Termius Team features, while you're a student.

title: Mathpix
description: Advanced OCR for math equations and documents; converts images and PDFs to LaTeX/Markdown. The educational plan duplicates the number of 'snips' and number of PDF pages available per month.

title: Cursor
description: Code editor with AI features. Verified university students can get Cursor Pro free for 1 year (access to premium models and editor features).

title: Slack
description: Slack education program: Universities or legal student organizations can apply for a 85% discount on Slack Pro or Business+ plans.

title: SOLIDWORKS xDesign
description: Professional CAD suite for students: SOLIDWORKS xDesign Student Edition offers educational licenses at a very reduced price (about 60€/year instead of the 2.400€/year price for the commercial licence). It includes courses and certifications as well.

title: UNiDAYS
description:
Free platform for students that aggregates discounts on fashion, technology, subscriptions, and more (registration and verification with student email/ID).

The platform provides promotional codes for Nike, Addidas, Urban Outfitters, The North Face, Media Markt, Apple, Xiaomi and many more.

title: Student Beans
description:
Student discount platform (similar to UNiDAYS). Offers codes and deals on software, clothes, tecnology, etc.

There is a useful NordVPN 75% discount here.

title: Prezi
description: Prezi Plus at 50% discount (€4/month instead of 8€/month). Includes Prezi AI and advanced presentation tools.

title: Avid Media Composer
description:
Free Avid Media Composer for students. Professional video editing software.

Note: A professor needs to enroll, another great video editor (with a powerful free version) is Davinci Resolve.

title: Grammarly
description: Campus License for schools and universities.

title: Canva
description: Canva 100% Free if you are in school. For higher education a campus license is required.

title: Adobe Creative Cloud
description: Students get 64% discount (24.99€/month instead of 69.99€/month).

title: UnrealEngine
description: Free for a university to apply.

title: TryHackMe
description: Students get 37.5% discount on the Premium Plan.
